<h2>The Route (Tentative)</h2>

<h4><i>Aug. 11 - Henry, Ne. (Wyoming Border) to Broadwater, Ne. <b>(~73 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 12 - Broadwater, Ne. to Ogallala, Ne. <b>(~73 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 13 - Ogallala, Ne. to Brady, Ne. <b>(~73 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 14 - Brady, Ne. to Kearney, Ne. <b>(~73 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 15 - Kearney, Ne. to Hampton, Ne. <b>(~66 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 16 - Hampton, Ne. to Lincoln, Ne. <b>(~74 miles)</b></i></h4>
<h4><i>Aug. 17 - Lincoln, Ne. to Bob Kerrey Pedestrian Bridge in Omaha, Ne. (Iowa Border) <b>(~55 miles)</b></i></h4>
